Author: snefferu

Author: jayrambling
Text: I don't have OCD, but my eating disorder definitely changes depending on the severity of my mental illness at the time. I have depression and anxiety, and I'm pretty sure my depression stems from the eating disorder and not the other way around. When I'm more depressed I'm more likely to binge, therefore making me more depressed. I wouldn't quite call it BED because I think they're subjective binges but binging nonetheless. When i'm more anxious I restrict more
